LightningComponentBundle.description: Hierarchical data visualization using nested rectangles sized by value. Supports flat data auto-nesting, color by category/depth, and click-to-zoom drill-down.

property.name: soqlQuery
property.label: SOQL Query
property.description: SOQL query to fetch data for the treemap
property.placeholder: SELECT StageName, Type, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Amount > 0

property.name: groupByField
property.label: Group By Field
property.description: API name of the field to group by (primary hierarchy level)

property.name: secondaryGroupByField
property.label: Secondary Group Field
property.description: Optional second field for nested hierarchy (creates two levels)

property.name: valueField
property.label: Value Field
property.description: API name of the numeric field to aggregate (not needed for Count)

property.name: operation
property.label: Aggregation
property.description: How to aggregate values within each group

property.name: height
property.label: Height (px)
property.description: Chart height in pixels

property.name: theme
property.label: Color Theme
property.description: Color palette for the treemap

property.name: colorMode
property.label: Color Mode
property.description: Color by category (group) or by nesting depth

property.name: showLabels
property.label: Show Labels
property.description: Display labels on rectangles

property.name: minLabelSize
property.label: Min Label Size (px)
property.description: Minimum rectangle dimension to show labels

property.name: tilePadding
property.label: Tile Padding (px)
property.description: Padding between rectangles

property.name: innerPadding
property.label: Inner Padding (px)
property.description: Padding within nested groups

property.name: enableZoom
property.label: Enable Zoom
property.description: Allow click-to-zoom into nested groups

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Object API name for navigation on click

property.name: filterField
property.label: Filter Field
property.description: Field to use for filtering when navigating (defaults to groupByField)

property.name: advancedConfig
property.label: Advanced Config (JSON)
property.description: {"customColors": ["#FF5733", "#33FF57"], "showTotal": true}

property.name: recordCollection
property.label: Record Collection
property.description: Collection of records from Flow

property.name: secondaryGroupByField
property.label: Secondary Group Field
